answers.answer: Yes, with a weight of 258 you should have a blood test called an A1C test to make sure you are not diabetic. These are classic symptoms of diabetes. If the test is negative see an ophthalmologist. Find one near you at www.aao.orgNormal A1c is 5.7 or LESS  no diabetes.    5.7-6.4 pre diabetic  greater than 6.5  frank diabetesJCH MD

question: In a matter of 2-3 weeks I could no longer see with glasses. My vision is not better but I can see better withuot them. What I used to see with my normal glasses ( upper part) I now use my bifocal. I tried a few older pairs but I was still able to see better without them. I have astygmasism along with nearsighted. I,m not diabetic and I don,t have high blood presser. I,m 51 yrs old and my weight is 258.Any answers?
title: Eye Rx change
